snippet: Closing arguments are expected on Thursday in the trial of Gilberto Valle, who is accused of plotting online to torture, kill and eat women.
abstract: Jurors in the trial of New York City Police Officer Gilberto Valle, who is accused of plotting online to torture, kill and eat women, appear to be a diverse group of residents from the city who are hard to shock, having endured a selection process that asked whether the grisly and often sexually explicit testimony and images in the case would affect their ability to be impartial.
lead_paragraph: Closing arguments are expected on Thursday in the trial of Gilberto Valle, who is accused of plotting online to torture, kill and eat women.

headline.seo: Jurors in Cannibalism Trial All Say They Use Internet
headline.main: Officer’s Trial Has a Jury That Appears Tech-Savvy
headline.print_headline: Officer’s Grisly Trial Has a Jury That Appears Tech-Savvy
